feat.name: Goldhand Diplomacy
entries: You have developed a deep distrust or hatred toward a particular race. Choose a playable race, you gain a number of traits in relation to your chosen race. You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do so, you must choose a different playable race.

items: You gain a bonus +1 to attacks rolls you make against your chosen race.
You have advantage on saving throws against your chosen race.
You have advantage on intimidation checks against your chosen race.
Every creature friendly towards you within 50 feet that can see and hear you has disadvantage on Charisma skills against your chosen race.
